text: William Guy Collar (born 3 February 1997) is an English professional footballer who plays for Hamilton Academical as a defensive midfielder. ==Career== ===Brighton & Hove Albion=== He made his debut for Brighton on 28 August 2018, in the EFL Cup at home against Southampton where he played the full match in a 1–0 loss against their south coast rivals.https://www.theargus.co.uk/sport/16603946 He left Brighton at the end of the 2018–19 season to join Hamilton Academical. ===Hamilton Academical=== He signed for Scottish club Hamilton Academical in June 2019.https://www.eveningexpress.co.uk/sport/will-collar-fits-the-bill-for- hamilton/ ==Career statistics== {| class=wikitable style="text-align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan=2|Club !rowspan=2|Season !colspan=3|League !colspan=2|FA Cup !colspan=2|League Cup !colspan=2|Other !colspan=2|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |Brighton & Hove Albion |2018–19 |Premier League |0||0||0||0||1||0||colspan=2|—||1||0 |- |rowspan=3|Hamilton Academical |2019–20 |Scottish Premiership |16||1||2||0||1||0||colspan=2|—||19||1 |- |2020–21 |Scottish Premiership |4||1||0||0||0||0||colspan=2|—||4||1 |- !colspan=2|Total !20!!1!!2!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!23!!1 |- !colspan=3|Career total !20!!1!!2!!0!!2!!0!!0!!0!!24!!1 |} ==References== Category:1997 births Category:People from Horsham Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Brighton & Hove Albion F.C. players Category:Hamilton Academical F.C. players Category:Scottish Professional Football League players Category:Association football midfielders
